title: "axb"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
illusory_vowel_keihan <- read_csv("csv/illusory-vowel-keihan_1.csv")
head(illusory_vowel_keihan)
illusory_vowel_keihan <- illusory_vowel_keihan %>%
  filter(task == "perception") %>%
  # filter(type=="target") %>%
  select(c(item_id, is_correct, rt)) %>%
  mutate(item_id = as.numeric(item_id)) %>%
  mutate(rt = as.numeric(rt)) %>%
  mutate(item_id = as.numeric(item_id)) %>%
  mutate(is_correct = is_correct == "true")
illusory_vowel_keihan
```
```{r}
# 文脈などのカラムをひっぱるのも可能
item_list <- read_csv("../src/list/perception_list.csv") %>% select(c(item_id, condition))
results <- merge(illusory_vowel_keihan, item_list, on = "item_id")
head(results)
```

```{r}
results %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = condition, y = rt))
```
```{r}
results %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = is_correct, color = condition, fill = condition), stat = "count")
```
